name: Crystal Trespass
description:
You are a highly intelligent gelatinous life form that travels throughout space consuming minerals in order to sustain yourself with their energy. After sensing an intense energy signal coming from within a wormhole in space you decide to investigate further and end up in a parallel universe. In this universe time moves so slowly that it can be considered frozen. The energy signal strengthened and you notice it is coming from glowing crystals.

Collect as many as you can before making your escape while exploring this world and its history but remember, even though are the only one moving does not mean you are alone. You are still a trespasser in this alien universe.
